p: The antiarthritic potential of terpenes, the main components in EOs, has been reviewed recently by Carvalho and colleagues [ 54]. An in vivo beneficial effect was reported for 24 terpenes, such as the triterpene emodinol isolated from Paeonia emodi Wall., and the sesquiterpene torilin, which were both demonstrated to modulate the levels of pro-inflammatory cytokines TNF-α, IL-1β, and IL-6 in vivo.
